title: Light Armour Proficiency
content:
Light Armour Proficiency Wearing Light Armour will not impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls or prevent you from casting spells.

Light Armour Proficiency

Wearing Light Armour will not impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls or prevent you from casting spells.

Light Armour Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
